website_summaries.verdict: This stopwatch has all of the technical functions many coaches seek, such as recordable split times, lap comparisons, and pacing. Durable and affordable.
pros: Records multiple split times for multiple athletes
cons: Reports of spontaneous starting and stopping

customer_reviews.title: A Rare Find
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite watch for coaching. I am a college track coach. I must have the running lap split AND running overall split. Nothing is worse than trying to figure out the math for the lap split (before actually seeing it at the end of the lap) in the middle of a workout with other groups also practicing. The third line of the watch allows me to do this with a simple click of the watch in the middle of a workout. This is great and pretty hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: gloveh09

customer_reviews.title: RECALL button does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the box this (03/26/2019) morning. I opened the package and set the clock time per instructions. Then tried START*STOP button functions. They worked properly. LAP/SPLIT*RESET button functions also worked properly. However the RECALL button did and does nothing; it will not pull the memory times to the display.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Herbster

customer_reviews.title: Dropped this watch on concrete at least 12 times. ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this watch on concrete at least 12 times. Thrown it into the pool at least 5 times. Couldn't coach without it!
customer_reviews.author: Cetmorr Wonnre

customer_reviews.title: still works great! The watch fits in my hands perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As a swim coach, it is so important to have a stop watch with all the extra features. This watch seems indestructible, I took it out of the package and immediately dropped it on the pool deck, still works great! The watch fits in my hands perfectly, the buttons are easy to use, and the display is bright and clear. This is an awesome watch that I would recommend to any coach, and would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: egcanne

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch! Multiple modes, very useful in Lap mode to keep track to time in current lap you are timing rather than trying to figure out the math on the spot. Awesome watch, if you are a coach this one is a must
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stopwatch that could split/lap for when I go running. This stopwatch worked for one day, but the build quality on the buttons is so bad that it's now broken. After one day on the track. The 'Mode' button is stuck, so I can't use the stopwatch at all. A cheaply-made, overpriced product.
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Adequate to get splits in multi-lap races for track meets. Have to hit split on the finish of a race to get that lap split and then hit stop after the race is completed -- a bit annoying, but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Old dependable...
customer_reviews.text: Had one that served me well for many years as a high school Track Official/Athletic Director. It wandered off when I lent it out as a back-up timer for a half marathon. Glad to see I could replace it with the same dependable model. Battery lasts forever, and it's always there when the fancy computer timing machines blank out/fail to record the first 100 finishers.
customer_reviews.author: jimjogs

customer_reviews.title: This stopwatch is amazing. I had one that lasted 10 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch is amazing. I had one that lasted 10 years and did the trick. I am a cross country and track coach and being able to do lap times is so beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda O.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item because I had another like it however
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because I had another like it however, it does not work as well as it should. All functions appears to work on the watch but when you press the start button and the counter gets to 9:59, it automatically reverts back to zero and continues counting to 19:59 and so forth instead of going to 10:00 or 20:00 etc. Not sure what the problem is here.
customer_reviews.author: O Smart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be my reserve timer, it quickly became my favorite timer! Heavy duty built - I was skeptical at first but it’s a really solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Santandres

customer_reviews.title: Trusty Watch
customer_reviews.text: I had a stopwatch like this one for over twenty years which stopped working. I liked it so was happy to find the same model. It has one more mode than my last watch (an additional way to do lap timing). The reason I like this model is the display. It makes for easy lap calculations--it does the calculation. The only thing is the buttons are not as sensitive, you really have to push hard to activate them.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis of CA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap But Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stopwatch to replace an older one I used at track events. The older one broke. This watch works fine, but it has a "cheap" feel. The start, stop, and lap buttons feel more like a toy than a watch. But I can't complain. The price was right and it works accurately. However, I don't expect it to last more than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Vahan Janjigian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65 and to keep fit I power walk. This is actually made for rowers but it's features work well for me. After starting the timer I press the mode button to take me out of timer mode and that disables the start/stop and lap buttons so I can stick it in my pocket and I know it will not accidentally stop the timer on me. It's large and vivid yellow which makes it easy to handle, hard to lose. The numerals are large and easy to see without reading glasses. I've been using mine for over a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: HOTPROP

customer_reviews.title: nice wtch  but it does not work
customer_reviews.text: It does not work but it would be a great stop watch if it only worked. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: myles mayers

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stop watch because I Coach Swimming for a local high school. It took me a while to figure out how to get the spilts the way I needed to in order to also have the ending time (because one lane in my pool, the touch pad doesn't work) so I have to use the lap setting in order to get the correct spilts and ending time. Over all it is a good stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: colle

customer_reviews.title: Defective Watch and Cannot be Returned
customer_reviews.text: The recall button stopped working while I was trying to get splits for my 400m relay members during their race. I bought the watch a few months ago but recently opened the package in April when my track season began. Now I am essentially stuck with a watch that does not serve any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The stopwatch you've always wanted
customer_reviews.text: the perfect stopwatch!!!!!! used it during track and field seasons for over 3 years and it has always worked.
customer_reviews.author: Mathtchrj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great stopwatch! Perfect for timing multiple swimmers during practice! Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Piering

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend whois also a coach. He thinks that this is a great stopwatch and easily worth a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: James Pattersenn Jr

customer_reviews.title: Reset button broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I've been a track coach for nearly 20 years. I bought this watch expecting it to last a season or two. The reset button broke unexpectedly, the second time I used it. I had owned the watch for less than a week, it hadn't even been dropped. Money wasted, very disappointing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second stopwatch (black) last September and yesterday the lense falls out while I was utilizing at track practice. Still works, but I have a yellow exact for about 2 years and no physical issues even after dropping, stepping on it by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for the price. Use it all the time and the feel of the buttons are great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Anyone knows what's going on?
customer_reviews.text: It's very dependable and easy to use Better in daylight than at night Unfortunately it suddenly turned from a normal good display to as shown in the photos anyone knows why please help After that happened I changed the battery and it didn't display normally I bought it on August the 5th 😅
customer_reviews.author: youko

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid workhorse. Works just as well as some of the more expensive memory stopwatches I've had previously. Only thing I don't like is the craftsmanship with the glass face - it's not placed quite right on either of the stopwatches I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Favorite stopwatch. Will order again when mine dies.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these. They’re great. The 3 line display is the most important part for getting splits. They don’t last forever but are definitely the standard for solid coaching stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: iamsoangry

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with the lap counter
customer_reviews.text: Have used it. Was very happy with the lap counter. The recall a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Horst Motz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch, splits and recall. This the best watch I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Glendon

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Wish I would Have boughten this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wish I would Have boughten this one the first time, instead of just a one clock stop. Love this stopwatch. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: J & A Noll

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Sper Scientific that works great. Spend a little more money and get a ...
customer_reviews.text: When you press stop after last lap, that lap does not register in the results. Bought a Sper Scientific that works great. Spend a little more money and get a much better stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product... exactly what I needed for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Sportysam

customer_reviews.title: It's a stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch was used for motorsports activity so I wasn't using it directly for it's intended purpose, that's why I gave it four stars. The watch performed flawlessly with no mechanical errors.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch, when it doesn't break
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these stopwatches and have used them for years. I guess I got a dud. The 'mode' and 'recall' buttons on this stopwatch both stopped working within a month of purchase. I am hoping to do a defective return to the seller even though I am outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Boele

customer_reviews.title: This is the most reliable stopwatch I have used in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most reliable stopwatch I have used in my 20 years of coaching Track and Field. It is a dependable brand and its functionality is eternal.
customer_reviews.author: winevrythg

customer_reviews.title: great for getting splits accurately
customer_reviews.text: Age Group swim coach, great for getting splits accurately, reviewing the splits, easily able to read the times. Not sure how to use the pace function though, none of the other coaches do either so I just leave that function alone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: One of two Stopwatches stopped working correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered Ultrak stopwatches from other companies in the past. Typically they are good stopwatches. However, at the 3rd swim meet of the summer on ONE watch the recall button stopped working. Of course, return date was July 4th, so it didn’t get returned.
customer_reviews.author: Coach M

customer_reviews.title: impossible to rely on.
customer_reviews.text: Haywire! Will randomly start and stop on its own while timing races. If it did not have this issue it would be a nice stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: James Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Stop Watch
customer_reviews.text: It works just as described, the only thing I don't like is the beeping sound it makes, but really I use it at track meets and while outside at the meet I can never hear it so it doesn't bother me. Its perfect for taking splits, I use it for the 4X1 and 4x4 relays and its absolutely perfect for that. I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: BowserHouse

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fitness trainer, and I like this watch. It provides a great help to my practice. The reason why I give it four stars is because of certain restrictions. Other aspects are easy to use, and overall it is a good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Broken within months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for swim team. I am disappointed that one of them has already broke! The recall button has stopped working. I've only had it for 3 months and can't believe it already broke! The one that still works is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stop Watch. Ultrack 495 has 100 lap memory
customer_reviews.text: Great stop watch. I have been using this watch for a few years. They come in yellow and black covers. The color does not matter. The features on the watch are great. I can time 100 athletes by hitting the split bottom. I can then recall their times. The design is perfect. Easy to use. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carlos

customer_reviews.title: the only watch you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Been using one of these to time middle school track events for years. Easy to use, very user friendly. Decided I needed my own to use at practice as well. Can time many runners at once on the 1600, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: A. Raines

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: The product was so awesome we bought a second one for our assistant coach!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and well-built. I've coached swimming for 5+ years ...
customer_reviews.text: Dependable and well-built. I've coached swimming for 5+ years now and won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Ultrak
customer_reviews.text: This is very odd to me because I owned this same watch and kids broke it. Bought this new one with same model number and everything and it feels incredibly cheaper. Buttons are flimsy and just doesn't feel like the quality of the other. I will contact the company and look into this because I am not very impressed with the drop in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Valery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the engineering, simplicity and the price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Sprecher

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I work as a swim coach, and it hold up great on deck and works well for multiple splits. Sharpie eventually wears off of the back
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a stop watch for work and this one was perfect. The price was great as well
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A Great Timer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Gift item and the person receiving it one happy Dude!
customer_reviews.author: William R Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: 495 Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good stopwatch watch for measuring cycle times. We've used them for a number of years throughout our manufacturing plant. We have purchased about 30 of them and have been very satisfied with the functionality. I know there are cheaper stopwatches, but I would definitely recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Lean One

customer_reviews.title: Best timer
customer_reviews.text: simple and easy to use timer. I coach kids and use it for all track meets and practices with no hassle. I recommend this for basic usage.
customer_reviews.author: 8Menon

customer_reviews.title: This timer has just what I wanted. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This timer has just what I wanted. It is slightly different from the previous model I had in that one just clicks repeatedly on the recall button to get all stored times. Previous model had a separate button to scan through the recorded times.
customer_reviews.author: Old geezer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional type watch. The splits are easy to use and the watch is very accurate. I used it for my entire track season and was able to keep accurate splits on multiple runners in the same heat quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sebert

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I am a track and CC coach and needed a new watch. Had it about a week. Love the way it shows splits, running time and total time for each split. Also discovered the frequency thing that is great for figuring out cadence. Also shows time and date which many watchs don't. Has everything I need and nothing I don't. Will be testing its durability now with planned heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking splits in relays and open events. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wilshusen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are very "heavy" makes it hard to press them quickly when getting multiple close times.
customer_reviews.author: Fm

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Button broke first use and they would not let me return it...
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the memory function for the relays
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. I especially like the memory function for the relays.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: great stopwatch, works like a charm! The functions are easy to use, and the buttons work without fail. I use this watch to time track events, and the lap function works great to capture finish times for runners.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works well, clicks
customer_reviews.text: Great timer for swim coaches... the best "cheaper" watch out there. I like that it clicks, so I know it has started (or gotten split, or stopped) without having to look at it. Not incredibly sturdy, so I just always connect the string to my belt loop to make sure I don't drop it on the ground or in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: you need this if you coach
customer_reviews.text: Price to value ratio very good, awesome watch. read instructions and practice although it is fairly intuitive, don't wait until you really need it to try it. Takes some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the 100 lap memory timer works very well and the buttons are easily controllable.
customer_reviews.author: michael feurtado

customer_reviews.title: Ultrak 495 stop watch
customer_reviews.text: I have used this watch for the past five years coaching track and field and swimming. I bought the same model to give as gifts to new coaches. I can time splits with both the split time and the running time at the split. I can also recall the time after I have cleared it up until I start it again. That feature has come in handly at different times. This is a great watch for the money and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great all around watch
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered promptly and has performed flawlessly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a high quality stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Have used this product for over 3 years and have never experienced any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars only.
customer_reviews.text: works well. The Recall button stopped working a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Saab nj

customer_reviews.title: they are good watches.
customer_reviews.text: For rowers, who need stroke ratings, this is the watch to buy. I have had dozens of these... they are good watches.
customer_reviews.author: Kourt

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for coaches for traing.
customer_reviews.text: Great for general swimming use and very good for stroke rate counting.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Regan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch. Does what I need it too. Also, the yellow color makes it easy to find in my bag at practice. I am a USA Swimming coach.
customer_reviews.author: Aquaman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Gave it 4 stars because I haven't had it long enough yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I have ever owned. Easy recall of splits
customer_reviews.author: Jon Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great stop watch for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am a head coach for a high school track team and I use this to get splits for the relay teams. It is very easy to use and has a recall too!
customer_reviews.author: bk33

customer_reviews.title: Great swimming stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I had an accusplit before that last me three swim seasons, but this watch feels sturdier and has a good button-feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use for sorting and penning events. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Good split tracking
customer_reviews.text: Get splits while reviewing recalled splits - pretty cool. Great for tracking lap times over a complete event...
customer_reviews.author: ctmick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, packaged securely and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, packaged securely and arrived on time. The only down side is the time is only 24 hour format.
customer_reviews.author: Athelynne Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Swim meets
customer_reviews.text: The stop watches I received went to good use. The price was right and delivery was right on time . i give five stars for the entire process.
customer_reviews.author: skalan

customer_reviews.title: stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Good product and the screen is easy to read. Easy to use and the directions are easy to learn. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eve M

customer_reviews.title: It is not even water resistant - don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this - I used it once, it got water on the surface (understanding it is water resistant) and it broke and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for Surface Supplied Diving. High recommend it. Easy to use. Good in all types of weather. Durable and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday! Accurate and durable. High school track and field coach.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Recall button won't work
customer_reviews.text: After only a month the "recall" button stopped recording times. It is very disappointing, it was the only reason I bought it
customer_reviews.author: John Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 3 days...
customer_reviews.text: The item seemed to worked fine when I first took it out of the package. After a flight home, I test it again and for some reason the Lap/Split/Reset button and the Start/Stop button aren't responding. The Mode button works sporadically, but the stopwatch is basically useless without the other buttons working. I'm disappointed that the watch malfunctioned after such a short amount of time. I was really looking forward to using it. Waste of my time and money if I have to send it back for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mishe

customer_reviews.title: Better than TYR and less money
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy watch that outlasts the others. Love it and love that it comes in yellow too. -Coach Bella
customer_reviews.author: Coach Bella

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Great watches. I've used this model for years of coaching.
customer_reviews.author: Groce

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and is substantially cheaper than the NK2000 whose failure ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and is substantially cheaper than the NK2000 whose failure prompted the purchase. I will still use the NK as a primary when it's working, but this is a fantastic backup.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Letson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best watch on the market. I coach XC and track and it's the only watch I'll use for meets.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: LOVING MY STOPWATCH
customer_reviews.text: As a track official it's imperative to have a reliable stopwatch. This is it! Never did it let me down this past track season. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: great stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little bit of getting use but a great timer to have. I would definitely recommend you having this item.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Tweedy, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Simply does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great stop watch. I time track and field and have had many stop watches and this us by far the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this, the start/stop button is a little hard to press but it is a great timer for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the one I need
customer_reviews.text: I am a navy diver in particular when supervising I need to keep the time of several different phases. Some supervisors keep the time with two stopwatches but with ultrak I don't need another one.
customer_reviews.author: deyan denev

customer_reviews.title: I usually love this brand as this is my third watch
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this brand as this is my third watch. Unfortunately I opened my newest one and it and it had a scratch on the screen already. Major bummer. Other than that it's a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bevans

customer_reviews.title: The watch works but it has a very slow response ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch works but it has a very slow response. The start and stop button has too much play in it.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Good stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch is very good. I like it & it was very easy to figure out how to use. I'm not a big fan of the 'chirp' that occurs when you start/stop it but it's something I'm able to overlook. I wouldn't pay more to not have the chirp.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia J. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Use it for XC timing at races
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Use it for XC timing at races. Easy to use and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money with all the functions of more expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it do much I brought another one same
customer_reviews.text: My last one lasted 8yrs. Loved it do much I brought another one same color
customer_reviews.author: Tonya McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for timing multiple splits and being able to look at them after the race.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad i was able to find a buy this timer, because it seems like no where in California do they sell this watch. Greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: somebodycool

product_meta.title: Ultrak 100 Lap Memory Timer
product_meta.description: The Coaches’ Favorite. 100 dual split recallable memory with continuous display of event time, three-line display in a classic case design, measures to 10 hours with 1/100 second resolution. Features stroke frequency along with time and calendar. Water resistant, five-year lithium battery and five-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Lap and cum splits, 100 dual split recallable memory, large 3-row display
Measures to 10 hours, stroke/frequency, time, calendar and alarm
Memory recall during operation, takes splits in recall mode
Lithium battery, water resistant, includes Lanyard

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
